gene_braintree.label: Braintree Payments - Configuration
gene_braintree.comment:
by
To use this module you will need an existing production or sandbox Braintree account. You can apply at braintreepayments.com.
Braintree Payments integration provided by Gene Commerce.

environment.label: Environment
environment.comment:
Warning: Do not use 'Sandbox' on a production environment.
Your API details above will need to reflect your Sandbox or your Production account.

merchant_account_id.label: Merchant Account ID
merchant_account_id.comment:
If you're accepting different currencies across multiple store views/websites you'll need to adjust your merchant account ID in the correct scope, if you're using the Magento currency switcher you'll need to enable the section below.
Find out more about merchant accounts.

sandbox_merchant_account_id.label: Sandbox Merchant Account ID
sandbox_merchant_account_id.comment:
If you're accepting different currencies across multiple store views/websites you'll need to adjust your merchant account ID in the correct scope, if you're using the Magento currency switcher you'll need to enable the section below.
Find out more about merchant accounts.

multi_currency_enable.label: Enabled?
multi_currency_enable.comment:
If you're using the Magento built in currency switcher you'll need to activate this section to ensure the customers payment goes into your correct merchant account. If you use store views for separate countries you do not need this feature enabled.
Note: The invoices will still show up as your base currency, but the customer will be charged in their selected currency for the correct amount.

multi_currency_mapping.label: Mapping
multi_currency_mapping.comment: You need to supply each merchant account ID for each enabled currency.

debug.label: Debug
debug.comment: Debugging will cause a log to be written to the var/log/gene_braintree.log file. As no credit card data ever hits the server this file will never contain any crucial customer information.

gene_braintree_paypal.label: Braintree Payments - PayPal
gene_braintree_paypal.comment: You must first configure the Braintree Payments - Configuration section with your Braintree account details.

express_active.label: Enable Express Checkout
express_active.comment: PayPal Express functionality allows customers to checkout directly with PayPal instead of using the default checkout.

express_cart.label: Enable in Cart
express_cart.comment: Allow customers to complete their order via PayPal express, this will complete the entire quote.

express_pdp.label: Enable on Product Page
express_pdp.comment: Allow customers to checkout directly from the product page using PayPal express. This will allow them to only checkout with the currently viewed item.

express_link_guest.label: Link Guest Orders to Customers
express_link_guest.comment: If an existing customer makes an express order using their customer account email should we link the guest order to their customer account?

payment_action.label: Payment Action
payment_action.comment:
Authorize - Will only auth the payment and store a token, the transaction will not be settled.
Authorize & Capture - We will instantly settle the transaction within the checkout.

capture_action.label: Capture Action
capture_action.comment: If you're just authorizing transactions you can define at what point they should be submitted for settlement.

payment_type.label: Payment Type
payment_type.comment:
Checkout - Will only require the customer to sign in, we will only be able to take a single payment.
Vault - Allows us to save the customers PayPal account for later purchases and use with the Vault.
View more information

use_vault.label: Enable Vault
use_vault.comment: Storing the customers PayPal in the vault will allow them to instantly purchase any product without having to login to PayPal again.

use_vault_only_on_vault.label: Vault Flow only for Vault Requests
use_vault_only_on_vault.comment: Use the checkout flow for all transactions that the customer has not opted into having their PayPal account saved. This can improve conversion rates as the Vault flow requests the customer setup a billing agreement.

locale.label: Locale
locale.comment: The locale for the PayPal popup window

gene_braintree_creditcard.label: Braintree Payments - Credit Card
gene_braintree_creditcard.comment: You must first configure the Braintree Payments - Configuration section with your Braintree account details.

payment_action.label: Payment Action
payment_action.comment:
Authorize - Will only auth the payment and store a token, the transaction will not be settled.
Authorize & Capture - We will instantly settle the transaction within the checkout.

capture_action.label: Capture Action
capture_action.comment: If you're just authorizing transactions you can define at what point they should be submitted for settlement.

form_integration.label: Form Integration
form_integration.comment:
Hosted Fields - Hosted Fields are small, transparent iframes that replace the sensitive credit card inputs in your checkout flow - helping you meet the latest data security requirements while ensuring your customization doesn't suffer. Find out more
Currently the module does not support any other integrations provided by Braintree.

hostedfields_descriptor.label: Hosted Fields Descriptor
hostedfields_descriptor.comment: Display a message above the card details section on the checkout.

use_vault.label: Enable Vault/Saved Cards
use_vault.comment: The vault allows you to securely store the customers credit card on Braintree's servers. We're provided with a token which allows the customer to make future payments without having to enter any details again.

useccv.label: CVV Verification
useccv.comment: Should we verify the CVV against the card?

display_cctypes.label: Display Card Types
display_cctypes.comment: Display the accepted card types on the checkout.

threedsecure.label: Enable 3D Secure
threedsecure.comment:
The 3D Secure feature enables the shopper to enter a password to confirm their identity with the card issuer. If accepted they then complete their order, and when received by you, you have much more confidence that is genuine and real.
Notice: To use 3D secure your checkout must run over HTTPs, this is required for both production and sandbox configurations.

threedsecure_failed_liability.label: Failed Liability Shift Action
threedsecure_failed_liability.comment:
Action to complete if the liability shift fails after the 3D secure. If the liability cannot be shifted the merchant is liable for charge backs.
Request Alternative Payment Method - Block the payment and inform the customer to choose a different payment method. This will also block any cards that do not support 3DSecure.
Accept & Mark as Fraud - Will accept the payment but mark as fraudulent within Magento for manual inspection.
Accept - Will accept the payment and be processed as a normal order (this setting is not recommended).

threedsecure_threshold.label: 3D Secure Threshold
threedsecure_threshold.comment: The threshold which requires a transaction to be passed through 3D secure. Set this to 0 to pass all transactions through 3D secure.

threedsecure_allowspecific.label: 3D Secure for Applicable Countries
threedsecure_allowspecific.comment: Determine when 3D secure should display based on the customers billing country. Cards vaulted using 3D secure will ignore this option.

kount_merchant_id.label: Kount Merchant ID
kount_merchant_id.comment: Braintree offers a direct integration with Kount, our partner for providing advanced fraud detection technology. To use this feature, you must be processing at least 2500 transactions per month, and you’ll be subject to additional fees from Kount for their services. To get started, contact accounts@braintreepayments.com. You can view more information here.

kount_environment.label: Environment
kount_environment.comment: Please specify which Kount environment you're using.

kount_api_key.label: API Key
kount_api_key.comment: Your Kount API authentication token. This can be located through the Kount AWC panel, via Admin > API Keys. Please ensure it has all permissions.

skip_advanced_fraud_checking.label: Skip Advanced Fraud Checks on Admin Orders
skip_advanced_fraud_checking.comment: Prevents the transaction from being sent to Kount for evaluation as part of Advanced Fraud Tools checks, on orders placed through the admin only.

kount_ens_url.label: Event Notification System (ENS) URL
kount_ens_url.comment: This is the ENS URL you will need to add into your website in the Kount AWC control panel. This URL must be publicly accessible for the ENS to function correctly. You'll need to add this ENS URL to the 'OPT-IN' website.

kount_ens_ips.label: Event Notification System (ENS) Allowed IPs
kount_ens_ips.comment: The IPs that have access to the ENS endpoint above. These can be individual IP's or ranges separated with commas. To allow from all IPs leave this field empty (not recommended).
